name: Progressive Slots Pro
description:
Compete with other players worldwide to win the progressive jackpot in this authentic feeling mechanical slot machine!

Whose name will be displayed for all to see? It could be yours, if lady luck is on your side.

* The more people that play, the faster the progressive increases.
* Compete with your friends with Game Center leader boards!
* Earn Game Center achievements as you play.
* The look and feel of the real thing, without any risk!
* One of the best Slot Machines in the App Store!

The Fun Vegas Casino Experience on the go! Don't forget to check our Slots, Slot Machine and other casino apps, including blackjack, roulette, craps and poker.
